example_sentences.eng_trans: act independently [separately, on one's own initiative]; behave independently; go one's own way
take action (by) oneself; take the initiative; go one's own way; do not depend on other people
act cautiously [with caution, with circumspection]; move carefully; be careful [cautious, circumspect]
act on one's own initiative [without reference to other people]; take action by oneself [″ off one's own bat]; make one's own moves; go ahead on one's own
Think carefully before you do anything [act, take action]. ｜ Look before you leap.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: よく考えて行動しなさい。

example_sentences.eng_trans: be bold in action; act boldly
be prompt in action; act promptly [with promptitude]
He doesn't think before he leaps. ｜ He doesn't plan [think] before he acts.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: あいつは考えるより行動が先だ。

example_sentences.eng_trans: His actions don't match up to his words. ｜ What he says and what he does are quite different [aren't the same thing].
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼は言葉に行動が伴わない。

example_sentences.eng_trans: express [show] 〈what one thinks〉 by one's behavior [one's actions, what one does, the way one behaves]
Don't just say it. Do it [Put it into action] (and show me that you mean it).
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 口で言うだけでなく行動で示してくれ。

example_sentences.eng_trans: show by one's actions [behavior, manner] that one is sorry
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 謝罪の気持ちを行動に表す

example_sentences.eng_trans: translate 〈one's idea〉 into action; put 〈an idea〉 into action; carry out [execute] 〈a resolution〉; act out 〈a fantasy〉
This is an emergency, and demands immediate action. ｜ In view of the emergency [critical situation] we must hurry up and do something.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 緊急事態だから速やかに行動に移らなくてはならない。

example_sentences.eng_trans: I watched him [his behavior] carefully all the time. ｜ I kept an eye on him [his movements, his behavior, what he was doing].
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 絶えず彼の行動に注意していた。

example_sentences.eng_trans: do [undertake] something dangerous; make a dangerous move
He did something unexpected. ｜ He acted [behaved] unexpectedly. ｜ He made an unexpected move [a move I hadn't anticipated].
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼は思いがけない行動に出た。

example_sentences.eng_trans: limit [restrain, restrict] sb's freedom of action; tie sb's hands
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 行動の自由を束縛する

example_sentences.eng_trans: Group tours restrict your freedom of action. ｜ Going on a group tour means you can't do what you want.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 団体旅行だと行動の自由が制限される。

example_sentences.eng_trans: be allowed freedom of action [movement]; be allowed to do what one wants
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 行動の自由が与えられる

example_sentences.eng_trans: 【心理・社会】 a behavior pattern.
act [behave] carefully [cautiously, with circumspection]; make a cautious move; take cautious steps
act [behave] carelessly [rashly, without circumspection]; make a rash move
act on one's own [independently]; make an independent move; take independent steps; go it alone
act with…; act together with…; cooperate with…; cast in one's lot with…; act in concert with…
They are [work] together night and day. ｜ They spend twenty-four hours a day in each other's company.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼らは四六時中行動を共にしている。

example_sentences.eng_trans: start action; set to work; make a move; get down to work [it]
You'll have to be a bit more careful [behave yourself rather better] in future.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 今後はもう少し行動を慎まなければいけないぞ。

example_sentences.eng_trans: watch [keep an eye on] sb's movements; keep an eye on sb [sb's behavior, actions, what sb does]
restrict [limit] sb's freedom (of action); tie sb down.
He behaved [acted] like a gentleman.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼の行動は紳士的であった。

example_sentences.eng_trans: You never know [can't predict] what she's going to do next. ｜ She's unpredictable.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼女の行動は先が読めない。

example_sentences.eng_trans: covert action.
〈take〉 military action; a (military) campaign; 〈carry out〉 an operation; 〈conduct〉 (military) operations.
social behavior.
⇒じゆうこうどう.
⇒<reference>だんたい<sup>１</sup></reference=21f86:5b2>, <reference>たんどく<sup>２</sup></reference=21fad:41e>.
direct action.
antagonistic [hostile] behavior; aggression; hostility; 〈go on〉 the offensive; 【軍】 hostile operations.
joint [united] action.
problem behavior.
【心理】 the acting out 〈of an impulse〉.
a doer; a person who gets things done; a leader type; a man [woman] of action.
behavioral counseling.
behavioral science(s). ➪behavioral scientist n.
a program (for action); an action plan; a plan of action.
【生態】 a home range.
【空】 an equitime point.
⇒こうどうしゅぎ.
【医】 a behavior disorder.
activity; activeness; mobility.
behavioral ecology.
ethology. ➪ethological adj.; ethologist n.
active; full of energy; bouncy; aggressive.
a behavioral trait [characteristic].
⇒こうどうはんい.
⇒こうどうはんけい.
behavioral pathology.
a course [line] of action.
【社会】 a behavior [behavioral] pattern; a pattern of behavior.
【精神医】 behavior therapy.
energy; power of action.
